articles.title: Art Performance Given for Nuclear Scientists and Technicians in Presence of Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Art Performance Given for Nuclear Scientists and Technicians in Presence of Kim Jong Un
 Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- There took place an art performance at the People's Theatre in congratulation of nuclear scientists and technicians who brought the great auspicious event of the national history, extra-large event through perfect success in the H-bomb test.
					 Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un together with Ri Sol Ju appeared in the auditorium.
					
					 He warmly waved back to the enthusiastically cheering performers and audience.
					
					 Following him senior officials and meritorious nuclear scientists and technicians in the field of defence science took auditorium.
					
					 Among the audience were contributors to the successful test of H-bomb for ICBM, officials and meritorious persons of the atomic energy field.
					
					 The performers presented the marvelous stage congratulating the nuclear scientists and technicians.
					
					 The performance began with the National Anthem. Put on the stage were female chorus and male chorus "Glory to General Kim Jong Un", orchestra and male chorus "The Glorious Motherland" and other colorful numbers.
					
					 The performers highly praised the undying feats of Kim Jong Un who has regarded it as the most important state affairs to accomplish the great cause of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for building the nuclear force and firmly guaranteed the victorious advance and eternal future of the cause of the Juche revolution while stubbornly passing through untrodden snow in the nuclear weaponization inch by inch.
					
					 The moment when the bright image of Kim Jong Un was screened on the background and his thunderous voices resounded, the hall echoed with enthusiastic applause with excitement.
					
					 Orchestra "At a Go", female chorus and male chorus "Let's Keep the Revolutionary Faith to the Death" and female chorus "Glory of Our Life" reflecting the spiritual world of the scientists mesmerized the audience.
					
					 The performance ended with orchestra and male chorus "We Will Go along Road of Loyalty".
					
					 At the end of the performance Kim Jong Un congratulated the successful performance, warmly waving back to the performers and audience.

articles.title: Nuclear Scientists and Technicians Feted in Presence of Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Nuclear Scientists and Technicians Feted in Presence of Kim Jong Un
 Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea gave a banquet in congratulation of the nuclear scientists and technicians who brought the great auspicious event of the national history, an extra-large event through the perfect success in the test of H-bomb.
					 Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un was present at the banquet.
					
					 Present there on invitation were the contributors to the successful ICBM-ready H-bomb test.
					
					 Kim Jong Un appeared at the banquet hall of the Mokran House and reviewed a guard of honor of the Ground, Naval and Air and Anti-Air Forces of the Korean People's Army and the Worker-Peasant Red Guards together with those contributors.
					
					 Ri Man Gon, vice-chairman of the C.C., WPK, made a congratulatory speech.
					
					 He warmly congratulated the brave heroes who made a great contribution to attaining the final goal of completing the state nuclear force set forth at the Seventh Congress of the Party by achieving the perfect success in the test of H-bomb upon the authorization of Kim Jong Un, commander-in-chief of the nuclear force of the Republic.
					
					 He said that the nuclear death-defying corps members who plunged into the nuclear battle site and carried out the Party's order at any cost by unsparingly dedicating their youth, lives and family happiness without wanting any honor or praise are, indeed, the real patriots and unassuming persons of distinguished service to be respected by the whole country.
					
					 One hardly knows the detailed struggle and merits of the nuclear developers, but our Party carefully considers their blood and sweat and heroic exploits deep in the ground and most highly praises them, the speaker said, and went on:
					
					 There are not a few people engaged in the national defence in the world, but only our nuclear developers lead a worthy life with the greatest glory and happiness under the particular love and care of the leader.
					
					 Our H-bomb with super explosive power is certainly the H-bomb of Kim Jong Un produced by his ardent love for the country and the people and the thermonuclear bomb of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 Our Party is designing the bright tomorrow of a socialist power in firm reliance on the defence scientists boundlessly faithful to the country and revolution, the speaker said, stressing the need for the nuclear developers to fully equip themselves with the spirit of defending the Party Central Committee unto death, more dynamically conduct the campaign of the final stage for completing the state nuclear force and thus fill the arsenal of the Supreme Command with the world strongest nuclear warheads capable of totally contain the enemy.
					
					 At the banquet Kim Jong Un made significant remarks.
					
					 He highly praised the nuclear developers for most proudly and realistically carrying out the sector tasks set forth at the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea, and gave thanks once again to them on behalf of the Party and the state.
					
					 He said earnestly that how glad leader Kim Jong Il must be when he knew the news of today's victory as he hewed out the road of building the nuclear force of the DPRK and led the work to victory. The recent test of the H-bomb is the great victory won by the Korean people at the cost of their blood while tightening their belts in the arduous period, he stressed.
					
					 He called upon all the fields and units to follow the fighting spirit and trait of the nuclear combatants who are taking the lead in the drive for carrying out the decisions of the Seventh Congress of the Party.
					
					 He put forward the tasks for the scientists and technicians in the field of defence science to conduct scientific researches for bolstering up the nuclear deterrence of self-defence in the drive to attain the final goal of completing the state nuclear force, true to the Party's line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force.
					
					 He said that the final victory of the Juche revolution is certain as there are firm self-supporting economic foundation provided by the great leaders, the large contingent of talented scientists, army and people having the revolutionary spirit of Paektu and their fighting tradition of self-reliance.
					
					 He called upon the reliable nuclear combatants of our Party to win greater victory with redoubled efforts, not slackening the spirit displayed by them in bringing the great auspicious event of the national history, extra-large event through the successful H-bomb test.
					
					 The banquet proceeded in an atmosphere overflowing with the high revolutionary enthusiasm of the participants to firmly defend the Party and the revolution with the strongest nuclear bombs in the world by successfully concluding the research and development campaign of the final stage for completing the state nuclear force, upholding with loyalty the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Present at the banquet were Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae and other senior officials of the Party, state and army.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Contributors to Successful ICBM-Ready H-bomb Test
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Contributors to Successful ICBM-Ready H-bomb Test
 Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un had a photo session with the contributors to the successful ICBM-ready H-bomb test at the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun.
					 When Kim Jong Un arrived at the venue of the photo session, all the participants enthusiastically welcomed him, extending the highest glory and warmest thanks to him.
					
					 He, with a broad smile on his face, waved back to the cheering participants in token of his warm militant salute.
					
					 He highly praised once again the reliable combatants in the nuclear field of the party for dealing a merciless sledge-hammer blow to the U.S. imperialists and their vassal forces pouncing on from all directions to stamp out the sovereignty and rights to existence and development of the DPRK and demonstrating over the world the dignity of Juche Korea and the strong spirit of its heroic people by producing a super-powerful Juche-based thermonuclear weapon.
					
					 Expressing the belief that the soldiers in the field of defence science would as ever register fresh miracles and innovations in the struggle for realizing the Workers' Party of Korea's plan for building a strategic nuclear force as they have devoted themselves to the drive to help the country join the ranks of the world's advanced nuclear powers, he had a photo taken with them.
					
					 Participated in the photo session were also Ri Man Gon and Hong Sung Mu, senior officials of the Central Committee of the WPK.

articles.title: Head of DPRK Delegation Speaks at Asia-Pacific Regional Ministerial Conference on Environment and Development
articles.content:
Head of DPRK Delegation Speaks at Asia-Pacific Regional Ministerial Conference on Environment and Development
 Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- DPRK Minister of Land and Environment Protection Kim Kyong Jun who is leading the delegation of the ministry on September 7 made a speech at the Asia-Pacific regional ministerial conference on environment and development held in Thailand.
					 He said that the DPRK government has long paid deep attention to environment protection and achieved successes.
					
					 Environment protection is not an issue confined to a country and a nation, and the unity in action should be provided to make the earth a planet without contamination, he noted.
					
					 It is regrettable that the U.S. decided to withdraw from the important convention of the whole world, giving priority to its interests and extreme economic calculation, he pointed out.
					
					 The U.S. "sanctions resolutions", products of its high-handed and arbitrary practices, are wantonly violating the Korean people's right to exist and develop and have negative influence on the international cooperation in the environment field and a typical proof is that the work being done by the cooperation of the United Nations Environment Programme and the United Nations Industrial Development Organization has not yet been promoted in the DPRK, he said.
					
					 He said it is the stand of the DPRK that the environment protection and international cooperation in this field should not become a victim of politics affected by the interests of individual countries as a global work.
					
					 He noted that the Economic and Social Commission for Asia and the Pacific of the UN and the United Nations Environment Programme should pay a due attention to taking necessary measure so that the sanctions against the DPRK have no impact on the international cooperation in the environment field.
					
					 He expressed the expectation that the Economic and Social Commission for Asia and the Pacific of the UN and the United Nations Environment Programme would discharge their responsibility and role in coordinating the growth of green economy suited to the sustainable development goals and the regional cooperation for the uncontaminated planet and providing the cooperation to all member states fairly without discrimination.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Lao President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Lao President
 Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Bounnang Vorachith, general secretary of the C.C., Lao People's Revolutionary Party (LPRP) and president of the Lao People's Democratic Republic, on Sep. 8.
					 The Lao president in the message extended warm congratulations and best wishes to the C.C., WPK, the DPRK government and all the Korean people on behalf of the C.C., LPRP and government and people of Laos and on his own behalf on the 69th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					
					 For the past 69 years, the DPRK has made steady socio-economic development under the leadership of the WPK, and the Korean people have undergone daily improvement in their living, the message said.
					
					 It expressed the conviction that the DPRK will overcome all hardships and ordeals under the guidance of Kim Jong Un and contribute to protecting and promoting the regional and global peace and stability.
					
					 It hoped that the traditional friendship and unity between the two parties, two states and two peoples will grow strong.
					
					 It sincerely wished Kim Jong Un good health and success in his noble work.

articles.title: Foreigners Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Foreigners Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
 Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- Kanji Inoki, member of the House of Councilors of Japan, and his party and other foreigners visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun Sunday.
					 The guests paid respects to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il before their statues at the palace. great leaders.
					
					 They paid tribute to the great leaders who lie in state.
					
					 They looked round rooms where the orders the great leaders received are on display and halls that house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: Kanji Inoki Visits Mangyongdae Children's Camp
articles.content:
Kanji Inoki Visits Mangyongdae Children's Camp
 Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- Kanji Inoki, member of the House of Councilors of Japan, and his party Sunday visited the Mangyongdae Children's Camp.
					 The guests went round various places of the camp.
					
					 They also toured the Central Zoo.

articles.title: Banquet Given to Celebrate DPRK's 69th Founding Anniversary
articles.content:
Banquet Given to Celebrate DPRK's 69th Founding Anniversary
 Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- A banquet was given at the Okryu Restaurant on Saturday to celebrate the 69th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Attending it were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju and other senior party, state and army officials, the chairman of a friendly party, officials of armed organs, the Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions and persons of merits.
					
					 Present on invitation were a congratulatory group of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan in celebration of the 69th founding anniversary of the DPRK, a delegation of the  Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan to mark the 70th anniversary of its formation, and other overseas compatriots, and foreign guests including representatives of embassies of different countries and international bodies and their wives and military attaches and their wives.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, said in his speech at the banquet that the blue and red flag of the DPRK reflects noble patriotism of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He extended the highest tribute and eternal glory to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who built the country into an invincible power independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in defence and demonstrating its might with Songun, and a country centered on the popular masses in which the Juche-based view on the people and popular philosophy are put into practice.
					
					 He noted that the DPRK is making a leap forward full of faith under the great plan for building a socialist power under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in the face of the worst adversity, greeting the heyday of its development.
					
					 No force on the earth can block the heroic advance of the DPRK dashing ahead like the storming wind under the banner of self-reliance, united close around the Party Central Committee, and the world will witness how Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea will fly the banner of the final victory on the eminence of the powerful socialist nation, he stressed.

articles.title: More Army-People Rallies Hail Success in H-bomb Test
articles.content:
More Army-People Rallies Hail Success in H-bomb Test
 Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- Army-people rallies were held in cities and counties to hail the complete success in the test of H-bomb for ICBM carried out under the Workers' Party of Korea's plan for building a strategic nuclear force.
					 Present there were officials of local party and power organs, working people's organizations, factories and enterprises, farms and universities, men and officers of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, people of all social standings, youths and students.
					
					 The speakers at the rallies in Kaechon and Kusong cities, Kowon and Thaetan counties hailed the thunder of the Juche-type thermonuclear weapon that heralded the final victory of socialism as an event of special significance which proved that the determination of the WPK precisely means practice and how Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea defends world peace and security and leads the cause of independence.
					
					 At the rallies in Samjiyon, Taehongdan, Paekam, Sijung and Ongjin counties the speakers stressed that no one can ignore the immense state power of Korea and its potentials, and that the DPRK's strategic position as a responsible nuclear weapons state having tremendous effect on peace in Asia and the rest of the world has become an irreversible one.
					
					 Similar rallies in Kaesong City and Pakchon and Myonggan counties heard resolutions of the service personnel and working people to keep waging confrontation with the imperialists and the U.S., rallied close around respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un with one mind until the U.S. and its vassal forces yield and surrender.

articles.title: Sojourn of Contributors to Successful ICBM-ready H-Bomb Test
articles.content:
Sojourn of Contributors to Successful ICBM-ready H-Bomb Test
 Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- The contributors to the successful ICBM-ready H-bomb test enjoyed colorful cultural and emotional life here.
					 They toured the Natural History Museum and the Central Zoo.
					
					 Looking round them, they knew again how warm the noble love for the people and posterity of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, who commits himself to making sure that the people enjoy the highest level of civilization, is.
					
					 They visited the Rungna Dolphinarium and the Rungna People's Pleasure Park.
					
					 At the Rungna Dolphinarium, they looked round the water tank for performance, auxiliary tank and welfare service facilities and had a pleasant time seeing skills presented by dolphins to the tunes of cheerful music.
					
					 They also spent a nice time at the Rungna 4D Simulation Cinema and video games room in the pleasure park.
					
					 They enjoyed their life at the Munsu Water Park.

articles.title: Pyongyang University of Fine Arts Marks 70th Anniversary
articles.content:
Pyongyang University of Fine Arts Marks 70th Anniversary
 Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- Pyongyang University of Fine Arts marked its 70th founding anniversary.
					 President Kim Il Sung, who provided the tradition of revolutionary cultural construction in the flames of the great anti-Japanese war, made sure that Pyongyang college of fine arts (at that time), the first training center of artists in the country, was established on Sep. 10, Juche 36 (1947), brightly indicated the mission, tasks, development and orientation of the college and guided the art pieces created by the teachers and students several times.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il set forth the great program for the Juche-oriented education of fine arts, laid firm foundations for training many talented reserve artists and led every aspect of the work to radically improve the quality of education in fine arts and effect a turn in the production of art pieces.
					
					 The 70 years-long history of the university reflects the exploits it performed in training a large number of reserves for competent artists and bringing the flowers of Juche fine arts into full bloom, thanks to the outstanding ideology of art education by the great leaders and their noble love for posterity and the future.
					
					 A meeting was held on Sunday.
					
					 It was attended by Kim Ki Nam, vice-chairman of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea, Minister of Culture Pak Chun Nam, officials concerned, teaching staff and students of the university.

articles.title: Powerful Military Muscle Guarantees Nation's Dignity and Sovereignty: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Powerful Military Muscle Guarantees Nation's Dignity and Sovereignty: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- Songun Korea has augmented national power in every way by its strength and its own style despite the strong wind of history, unrestrained by anything and not reading others' faces. Therefore, it could have inexhaustible power that no other big power could possess. Rodong Sinmun says this in an article Sunday.
					 The nation's dignity and the country's sovereignty are not presented by others. Only powerful military muscle can defend and glorify them.
					
					 The DPRK, unfolding the events of world significance one after another to change the political history of mankind, has bolstered the nuclear deterrent for self-defense guaranteeing the eternal future of the nation and peace of the planet. 
					
					 The U.S. and the forces following it drew so-called "red line" and are making desperate efforts to prevent the DPRK from bolstering up the nuclear deterrent.
					
					 The DPRK resolutely answered the enemies' political and military pressure, economic sanctions and moves of appeasement and deception with such toughest measures such as the ICBM-ready H-bomb test.
					
					 This is today's exciting reality brought about by Songun.
					
					 The DPRK has all its own-style options to frustrate and check enemies' invasion and is fully ready to counter any U.S. provocation.
					
					 The enemies' desperate efforts to deprive the DPRK of its sovereignty and the right to existence have resulted in making the flame of self-reliance and self-development rage on this land.
					
					 The revolutionary will and mental power of all service personnel and people to defend socialism, the life and soul of the DPRK at the cost of their blood and certainly build a powerful socialist country by their efforts are getting stronger day by day.

articles.title: DPRK's Bolstering up Nuclear Deterrent Is Just: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK's Bolstering up Nuclear Deterrent Is Just: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- The DPRK's beefing up its nuclear force is a step for self-defense to thoroughly defend the country's sovereignty and nation's right to existence from the nuclear war threats by the U.S. and its followers and reliably ensure peace on the Korean peninsula and the security in the region, and no one can take issue with it, Rodong Sinmun Sunday says in a commentary, adding:
					 The DPRK had access to nuclear weapons justly in order to defend the country's sovereignty and the nation's destiny and ensure peace on the Korean peninsula and in the region.
					
					 Even after the DPRK had access to nukes, the U.S. nuclear war drills did not stop, but rather became more frantic.
					
					 In particular, the Trump administration's policy hostile to the DPRK has driven the situation of the peninsula into an alarming phase beyond control.
					
					 The U.S. brigandish theory is that it can let us remain alive if we quit nuclear and obey them, but it can't tolerate us if we hold fast to nuclear and maintain independence. That's why such theory will never work on us.
					
					 Gone are the days never to return when the U.S used to pose threats to the DPRK unilaterally with nukes.
					
					 Very just is the DPRK's stand that no matter what others may say, as long as the U.S. persists in its hostile policy, the former will continue to take steps to beef up its nuclear force to protect the country's sovereignty and the nation's dignity.
					
					 The U.S. had better properly acknowledge the entity of Juche Korea, nuclear power worthy of the name, which has had access to A-bomb, H-bomb and even ICBM, and repeal its anachronistic ambition to stifle the DPRK.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Authorities for Resorting to Confrontation with Compatriots
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Authorities for Resorting to Confrontation with Compatriots
 Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- As soon as the DPRK's ICBM-ready H-bomb test was reported, the south Korean chief executive convened a "meeting of the National Security Council", where he asserted that "this is the most serious challenge" and called for a "proposal for powerful counteraction". Meanwhile, he phoned Trump and Abe one after another, letting out a spate of rhetoric that the "hardest pressure and sanctions should be put on the north" and "practical counteraction to deeply affect the north is needed" and begging for increasing the degree of slapping sanctions and pressure upon the DPRK.
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday in a commentary slams this as treacherous acts challenging the great event to be specially recorded in the nation's history spanning five-thousand years and an unpardonable provocation aimed at doing harm to the DPRK at any cost in collusion with outside forces. 
					
					 It is ridiculous for the south Korean puppet forces to trumpet about the "strong punishment", being unaware of their poor plight as the U.S. colonial stooges.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK are following with indignation every action of escalating the confrontation sought by the south Korean puppet forces who dare challenge the DPRK while acting as a shock brigade of the U.S. in its moves to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities pull up the DPRK's steps for self-defense and continuously resort to the confrontation with compatriots, they would meet stern judgment of history.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Air Pirates Stage Large-Scale War Drills
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Air Pirates Stage Large-Scale War Drills
 Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- The warmongers of the south Korean puppet air force staged Soaring Eagle exercises to invade the north from Sept. 1 to 8, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 In the period of war drills which involved more than 50 planes including fighters, control aircrafts, AWACs, transport planes and helicopters with various missions, the puppet air pirates desperately staged various drills including ground attack, anti-warship attack, aerial warfare, air disturbances and electric wave disturbances.

articles.title: S. Korean Teachers Issue Declaration Calling for Withdrawing THAAD
articles.content:
S. Korean Teachers Issue Declaration Calling for Withdrawing THAAD
 Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- Members of the south Korean  Teachers Union held a press conference in Seoul on Sept. 7 and issued a "declaration" calling for withdrawing THAAD and ensuring peace on the Korean peninsula, according to the south Korean paper Nodong and Segye.
					 Speakers underscored the need to strengthen the solidarity with all people opposing THAAD deployment and desiring peace and positively conduct education for peaceful future without war and terror.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Slams Authorities' Additional THAAD Deployment
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Slams Authorities' Additional THAAD Deployment
 Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- The Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society in south Korea issued a statement on Sept. 7 denouncing the puppet authorities for their unilateral acts for additional deployment of THAAD, according to press reports.
					The statement said that the authorities let more than 8,000 policemen forcibly dissolve at least 400 inhabitants and citizens who turned out in the action to check the THAAD deployment.
					
					 It stressed that the organization will carry on the struggle to withdraw the illegally deployed THAAD, together with inhabitants in Songju and Kimchon.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in Nigeria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in Nigeria
 Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted the full text of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Concluding Speech at the March 2013 Plenary Meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea" on its website on August 30 to mark the 69th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 In the concluding speech made on March 31, Juche 102 (2013), he said that the plenary meeting of the C.C., WPK served as a new landmark in defending and glorifying the feats performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il to build a nuclear power and in hastening the building of a socialist power.
					
					 He indicated the important matters arising in implementing the strategic line of the Party on simultaneously pushing ahead with the economic construction and the building of nuclear force.

articles.title: Swiss Bodies Hail DPRK as Invincible Power
articles.content:
Swiss Bodies Hail DPRK as Invincible Power
 Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- The DPRK, an independent country which does not yield to any pressure of outside forces, will fully demonstrate the might as an invincible power firmly safeguarding the world peace.
					 The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea said this in a joint statement on September 2 to mark the 69th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					
					 The statement said that the founding of the DPRK by President Kim Il Sung on September 9, 1948 was a very important historic event for the Korean people.
					
					 The founding of the DPRK made it possible for Korean people to have the genuine people's country.
					
					 Socialism built by the President in Korea, guided by the Juche idea, had been brilliantly developed under the leadership of HE Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Korean socialism a is victoriously advancing under the Songun leadership of respected Marshal Kim Jong Un who is carrying forward the idea and exploits of the preceding leaders.
					
					 The DPRK in which the entire army and people are united close around the leader is demonstrating its dignity as a nuclear power of Juche and the world military power.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and their vassal forces do not dare provoke the DPRK with single-minded unity and tremendous military power.

articles.title: DPRK's Founding Anniversary Marked in Bulgaria
articles.content:
DPRK's Founding Anniversary Marked in Bulgaria
 Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- The Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association released a bulletin to mark the 69th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 The bulletin in an article titled "September 9, the founding anniversary of the DPRK" said that President Kim Il Sung, who led the anti-Japanese war to victory and liberated Korea, put forth the line of building a reunified democratic and independent state, made sure that the general election was held in the whole of Korea and finally declared to the world the founding of the DPRK on September 9, 1948.
					
					 The bulletin also edited an article introducing the advantages of the socialist system of the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un presencia funcion artistica en honor de cientificos y tecnicos nucleares
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un presencia funcion artistica en honor de cientificos y tecnicos nucleares
Pyongyang, 10 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Se ofrecio en el Teatro del Pueblo la funcion artistica en honor de los cientificos y tecnicos nucleares quienes realizaron exitosamente la prueba de la bomba H instalable en el ICBM, gran jubilo nacional y acontecimiento especial. 
					El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un salio al asiento junto con su esposa Ri Sol Ju.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente respondio cordialmente a las fervientes aclamaciones de los ejecutantes y los espectadores. 
					
					Tambien tomaron asientos los funcionarios directivos de la rama de ciencia de defensa nacional y los cientificos y tecnicos nucleares ameritados.
					
					Vieron la funcion los contribuyentes a la exitosa prueba de la bomba H, los funcionarios y ameritados del sector de energia atomica.
					
					Los ejecutantes ofrecieron una funcion jubilosa para felicitar a los cientificos y los tecnicos nucleares. 
					
					En la escena iniciada con el Himno Patriotico, se presentaron el coro femenino y masculino "Gloria al General Kim Jong Un", el coro mixto y masculino "Gloria al Partido del Trabajo de Corea", la musica orquestal y el coro masculino "Patria radiante" y otras piezas.
					
					Los ejecutantes alabaron las imborrables hazanas del Maximo Dirigente quien al presentar como el mas importante asunto estatal el cumplimiento de la gran causa del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il por la construccion de las fuerzas armadas nucleares, allano palmo a palmo el camino virgen del armamento nuclear y aseguro firmemente el avance victorioso de la causa revolucionaria del Juche y el radiante futuro de la patria. 
					
					Cuando se proyecto en el fondo de la escena la imagen sonriente del Maximo Dirigente y se reprodujo su grabada voz sonora, toda la audiencia dio la efusiva ovacion.   
					
					Dieron una impresion viva a los espectadores la musica orquestal "De un tiron", el coro femenino y masculino "No renunciemos el credo en la revolucion aunque muramos" y el coro femenino "Gloria de la vida" que reflejan el mundo espiritual de los cientificos nucleares. 
					
					La funcion termino con la musica orquestal y el coro masculino "Iremos siempre por el camino de fidelidad". 
					
					Terminada la funcion, el Maximo Dirigente felicito el exito de la funcion respondiendo con su mano alzada a las aclamaciones de los ejecutantes y los espectadores.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un participa en banquete ofrecido en honor de los cientificos nucleares
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un participa en banquete ofrecido en honor de los cientificos nucleares
Pyongyang, 10 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Comite Central y la Comision Militar Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea ofrecieron una recepcion en honor de los cientificos y tecnicos nucleares quienes realizaron exitosamente la prueba de bomba H instalable en el ICBM, gran fiesta nacional y acontecimiento especial.
					El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un asistio al banquete.
					
					Fueron invitados los miembros contribuyentes al evento.
					
					En el salon de recepciones de la Casa Mokran, el Maximo Dirigente paso revista junto con los invitados a la guardia de honor de las fuerzas terrestres, navales, aereas y antiaereas del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito Rojo Obrero-Campesino.
					
					Ri Man Gon, vicepresidente del Comite Central del PTC, pronuncio el discurso de felicitacion.
					
					Por el encargo de Kim Jong Un, Comandante en Jefe de las Fuerzas Armadas Nucleares de la RPDC, el orador felicito calurosamente a los heroes valientes quienes al salir exitosos en la prueba de bomba H, hicieron gran aporte al logro de la meta de la etapa final de la perfeccion de las fuerzas armadas nucleares del Estado, presentada por el Septimo Congreso del PTC.
					
					Alabo a los cientificos nucleares, quienes cumplieron satisfactoriamente la orden del partido dedicando la juventud, la vida y la felicidad de su familia sin pedir nada a cambio, como los verdaderos patriotas y ameritados anonimos a ser respetados por todo el pais.
					
					Casi nadie sabe los esfuerzos y los meritos de los desarrolladores nucleares, dijo y destaco que pero, el partido los sabe y los aprecia altamente.
					
					En el mundo no pocas personas se dedican a la rama de defensa nacional, pero no existen los afortunados como los coreanos que bajo el primordial amor y la minuciosa atencion de su dirigente disfrutan de una vida digna, valiosa y envidiable, senalo y continuo: 
					
					De veras, nuestra bomba H de superpoder explosivo es la del Maximo Dirigente y la termonuclear del PTC en que esta lleno del ferviente amor del Maximo Dirigente a la patria y al pueblo. 
					
					Nuestro partido esta trazando el radiante futuro de la potencia socialista depositando la firme confianza en los cientificos de defensa nacional infinitamente fieles a la patria y la revolucion. 
					
					El orador finalizo su discurso exhortando a los invitados a llenar el arsenal de la Comandancia Suprema de las ojivas nucleares mas poderosas del mundo, capaces de sujetar a los enemigos, al armarse con el espiritu de defensa a ultranza al CC del PTC y librar una energica campana de la etapa final para la perfeccion de las fuerzas armadas nucleares del Estado.
					
					En la ocasion, el Maximo Dirigente pronuncio las palabras significativas.
					
					Tras apreciar las proezas de los desarrolladores nucleares quienes materializaron suficiente y sustancialmente las tareas por sectores presentadas por el Septimo Congreso del PTC, el Maximo Dirigente les dio otra vez el agradecimiento en representacion del partido y el Estado.
					
					Dijo en tono encarecido cuan se alegraria el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, quien emprendio la construccion de fuerzas armadas nucleares de la RPDC y la llevo adelante, si hubiera enterado de la noticia de victoria de hoy. Subrayo que el estruendo de la bomba H resulta una gran victoria del pueblo coreano obtenido a cambio de sangre apretando cinturon durante largo tiempo.
					
					Senalo que todos los sectores y todas las unidades deben aprender el espiritu y estilo de lucha de los combatientes nucleares que se encuentran en la delantera de la lucha por materializar la resolucion del VII Congreso del PTC.
					
					Presento a los cientificos y tecnicos del sector de ciencia de defensa nacional una tarea de librar mas ambiciosamente la investigacion cientifica por consolidar firmemente el disuasivo nuclear de caracter autodefensivo, apoyando fielmente la linea de desarrollo paralelo del partido en la lucha por conquistar la meta de la etapa crucial de la perfeccion de las fuerzas armadas nucleares del Estado.
					
					Recalco que es definitiva la victoria final de la revolucion del Juche gracias a la firme base de la economia autarquica preparada por los grandes lideres, el destacamento de los cientificos sobresalientes, los militares y civiles armados con el espiritu revolucionario del Paektu y la tradicion de la lucha de autoconfianza.
					
					Encomendo que los fidedignos cientificos nucleares del partido logren mayores exitos empenandose mas y manteniendo invariablemente el impetu de lucha con que se obtuvo el exito en la prueba de bomba H.
					
					Los participantes determinaron defender confiablemente el partido y la revolucion con la bomba nuclear mas poderosa del mundo, quedandose fiel a la direccion del Maximo Dirigente y terminando con exito la investigacion y el desarrollo de la etapa crucial para perfeccionar las fuerzas armadas nucleares del Estado.
					
					Participaron en la ocasion Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae y otros cuadros responsables del partido, el Estado y el ejercito.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un se fotografia con los contribuyentes a la prueba de bomba H
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un se fotografia con los contribuyentes a la prueba de bomba H
Pyongyang, 10 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un se fotografio en el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan con los contribuyentes a la exitosa prueba de la bomba H instalable en el ICBM.
					Cuando el salio al lugar de filmacion, todos los participantes le acogieron con estruendosas aclamaciones dandole la maxima gloria y el mas cordial agradecimiento.
					
					Con amplia sonrisa en su rostro, el Maximo Dirigente les envio el saludo combativo agitando su mano. 
					
					Y aprecio de nuevo los meritos de los dignos combatientes nucleares del Partido del Trabajo de Corea quienes al fabricar el arma termonuclear a estilo jucheano de superpoder explosivo, dieron el golpe demoledor a los imperialistas norteamericanos y sus seguidores que se desesperan para exterminar la soberania y el derecho a la subsistencia y al desarrollo de la RPDC, y manifestaron a todo el mundo la dignidad de Corea del Juche y el impetu del heroico pueblo coreano. 
					
					Y se fotografio con los cientificos de la rama de defensa nacional expresando la esperanza y conviccion de que como vinieron abnegandose por asentar la RPDC en la primera fila de potencia nuclear de talla mundial, ellos registraran en el futuro tambien nuevos milagros e innovaciones en la materializacion del proyecto del PTC sobre la construccion de las fuerzas armadas estrategicas nucleares.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente fue acompanado en esta ocasion por Ri Man Gon y Hong Sung Mu, funcionarios responsables del Comite Central del PTC.

articles.title: Ofrecido banquete por el 9 de septiembre
articles.content:
Ofrecido banquete por el 9 de septiembre
Pyongyang, 10 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 9 en el Restaurante Okryu el banquete por el 69o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Estuvieron presentes Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju y otros cuadros directivos del Partido, el Estado y el ejercito, el presidente de partido amigo, los funcionarios de los organismos de las fuerzas armadas, el Consejo de Ministros, las entidades de masas, los ministerios y organos centrales y los ameritados.
					
					Fueron invitados a la recepcion los miembros del grupo de felicitacion de los coreanos residentes en Japon para el 69o aniversario de la fundacion de la RPDC y la delegacion de la Union de Mujeres Democraticas Coreanas en Japon de visita en la patria en ocasion del 70o aniversario de su fundacion, los compatriotas ultramarinos, los matrimonios de los representantes diplomaticos y de organizaciones internacionales y los de agregados militares, acreditados en la RPDC, y otros huespedes extranjeros.
					
					Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC, dijo en su discurso que la bandera nacional de la RPDC esta impregnada del noble amor a la patria y al pueblo del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Y rindio el mas sublime homenaje y eterna gloria a los Grandes Lideres antecesores quienes glorificaron la patria como invencible potencia del Songun caracterizada por la independencia, autarquia y autodefensa, y como pais centrado en las masas populares.
					
					Menciono que bajo la direccion del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, la RPDC avanza vigorosamente llena de la fe en la victoria y acoge la era de esplendor de su desarrollo segun el gran proyecto de la construccion de una potencia socialista, pese a las peores adversidades. 
					
					Nadie puede impedir el avance heroico de la RPDC que marcha a galopes con la bandera de autofortalecimiento uniendose compactamente en torno al Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, dijo y concluyo que el mundo vera claramente como la nacion de Kim Il Sung, Corea de Kim Jong Il, llegara a la cima de la potencia socialista enarbolando la bandera de la victoria final.
